definition: as far as I know/to the best of my knowledge
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Here is the best system for note-taking and studying I've discovered so far.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一種最佳的聽課記筆記學習系統，據我所知。

sentences.english: To my knowledge, Stanhope have rich experience in finance, law and planning etc.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，他們在這方面都有豐富的經驗。

sentences.english: As far as I know, none has been translated.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，我的作品還沒有波斯文譯本。

sentences.english: All have pros and cons, but all are valid solutions AFAIK.
sentences.chinese: 各有利弊，但都是有效的解決方案，據我所知。

sentences.english: As far as I know. It has no definite season—no birthday, so to speak.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，這種花沒有特定的花季也就是沒有生日。

sentences.english: As we know, the incident tragically ended in the deaths of eight innocent civilians.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，事件導致8名無辜平民死亡，這是個悲劇。

sentences.english: For all I know, he’s never photographed a wedding or bar mitzvah in his life.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，他從來沒有爲婚禮和受洗拍過照片。

sentences.english: From what I've heard, you're already well up in shipping work.
sentences.chinese: 翠據我所知，你方對運輸工作很在行。

sentences.english: As far as I can see,when my body dies,that's it.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，當我的肉體死亡，一切完結。

sentences.english: I understand that Cain is the last descendant of the ancient Horadrim and that his knowledge of their lore is vast.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，凱恩是古代赫拉迪姆教派的最後傳人。

sentences.english: I know of some people who use the walking machine much faster, but that's not for me.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，有些人使用步行機快得多，但不適合我。

sentences.english: For as far as I can shout, the Number1 sharpener originated in 1900.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，削自動筆機起源於1900年。

sentences.english: So far as I know， there are risks of pilferage or damage to the goods during transshipment in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，在香港轉船期間有貨物被盜或損壞的風險。

sentences.english: which was all about Indian culture in Britain as far as I'm aware.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，它講述的全是在英國的印度文化。

sentences.english: Yes, I understand you're much better known as a star in Europe?
sentences.chinese: 恩，據我所知你在歐洲更加出名？

sentences.english: From what Ive heard, youre already well up in shipping work.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，你方對運輸工作很在行。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
hard to say/unpleasant to say/can't be sure
to keep one's calm in the face of the unexpected/not to wonder at strange sights
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
at the minimum/at the very least
